item.title: Ubuntu Install Wubipinyin
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: ubuntu安装 五笔拼音输入法 env Ubuntu Desktop 16.04 step 方法1 https://www.linuxdashen.com/ubuntu-16-04-%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85fcitx%E4%BA%94%E7%AC%94%E6%8B%BC%E9%9F%B3%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%B3%95 方法2 1 2 3 4 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:fcitx-team/nightly sudo apt update -y sudo apt -y install fcitx sudo apt -y install fcitx-table-wbpy System Setting/Language Support/Keyboard input method system/ => fcitx 打开System Settin
